attributes.action: do all in his power to secure the right to travel for Khaled Mudallal and all other Palestinians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned condemned the Israeli government’s aggression against Palestine and the decision to declare the Gaza strip a “hostile entity”.
We demand that the Prime Minister to do all in his power to secure the right to travel for Khaled Mudallal and all other Palestinians.
Since Israel identified Gaza as "hostile territory" hundreds of students are unable to return to their studies abroad.
We also call upon the British Government to recognise the right to education of the Palestinian people and petition the Israeli government to allow freedom of movement for Palestinians in and out of the Palestinian occupied territories and within the Palestine territories.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
